issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Wahram IV on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap; crown with mural element and two staggered wings; covered korymbos; two ribbons commencing to the left and right below the korymbos, pointing upwards; pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing below ball of hair; pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; tunica, neck-line edged with double row of pearls running from shoulder to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 5 h l. o. wrhr'n MRKAn MRKA- LYW| Wahrām šāhān šāh " Wahram, King of Kings - LYW"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; on the shaft l'st (rāst, "just"); to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; above bust with altar flames; to the left and right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Wahram IV, holding a barsom with both hands, both figures facing inwards; dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 3 h l. o. wrhr'n, 9 h l. o. 'twly ZY| ādur ī Wahrām|“the fire of Wahram”
issue_references_s: SNS 3 Mint DAL for LYW Type Ia1/3a
